protocol.text: treated with 10 μM dexamethasone (DEX) or MOCK (equal volume of ethanol) for 2 h
FHY3p:FHY3-GR fhy3-4 transgenic seedlings grown in D or continuous FR light for 4 d
total RNA was isolated using the RNeasy Plant Mini Kit (Qiagen)
RNA quality was assessed with an Agilent 2100 Bioanalyzer, and hybridization to the Affymetrix GeneChip Arabidopsis ATH1 Genome Arrays was performed according to the manufacturer’s instructions.
Following fragmentation, 10 ug of cRNA were hybridized for 16 hr at 45C on GeneChip Drosophila Genome Array. GeneChips were washed and stained in the Affymetrix Fluidics Station 400.
GeneChips were scanned using the Hewlett-Packard GeneArray Scanner G2500A.

Raw microarray data were normalized using the robust multiarray analysis (RMA) algorithm in the BIOCONDUCTOR affy package. Then the microarray data were analyzed using Significance Analysis of Microarrays (SAM) method with default parameters as well as a manual setting of false discovery threshold (FDR) < 0.027 in D and <0.022 in FR.
